1.name: The Mummy
1.description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreck havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

2.name: Eyes Wide Shut
2.description: A New York City doctor pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

3.name: The Matrix
3.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

4.name: Fight Club
4.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

5.name: The Sixth Sense
5.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

6.name: American Pie
6.description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

7.name: The Green Mile
7.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

8.name: American Beauty
8.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

9.name: She's All That
9.description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

10.name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
10.description: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

11.name: Office Space
11.description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

12.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
12.description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

13.name: The Virgin Suicides
13.description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

14.name: Cruel Intentions
14.description: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

15.name: Edtv
15.description: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

16.name: Big Daddy
16.description: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

17.name: Toy Story 2
17.description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

18.name: The Boondock Saints
18.description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

19.name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
19.description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

20.name: Tarzan
20.description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

21.name: Being John Malkovich
21.description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

22.name: Magnolia
22.description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

23.name: Girl, Interrupted
23.description: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.

24.name: Notting Hill
24.description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

25.name: Sleepy Hollow
25.description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

26.name: The Bone Collector
26.description: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

27.name: Varsity Blues
27.description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

28.name: Never Been Kissed
28.description: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

29.name: Any Given Sunday
29.description: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

30.name: Dogma
30.description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

31.name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
31.description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

32.name: The Blair Witch Project
32.description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

33.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
33.description: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

34.name: Payback
34.description: After a successful heist, Porter is shot by his wife and his best friend. They leave him there to die but when he recovers, he seeks revenge and wants his share of the money.

35.name: The World Is Not Enough
35.description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

36.name: Double Jeopardy
36.description: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

37.name: The Cider House Rules
37.description: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

38.name: Deep Blue Sea
38.description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

39.name: Wild Wild West
39.description: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth century inventor-villain.

40.name: Galaxy Quest
40.description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

41.name: The Haunting
41.description: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

42.name: October Sky
42.description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

43.name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
43.description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

44.name: The Insider
44.description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

45.name: Lake Placid
45.description: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

46.name: Stuart Little
46.description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

47.name: Boys Don't Cry
47.description: Female-born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

48.name: The 13th Warrior
48.description: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

49.name: Entrapment
49.description: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

50.name: The Iron Giant
50.description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
